name: Jake Milor
message: Computer Zone  Calls responded promptly to my distress call and was out the same day by squeezing me in between appointments.

name: Keanu Reeves
message: I don't know much about computers and they explained everything to me about what they were fixing. They fixed it very quickly and without any hassle for me

name: Jennifer Syme
message: The company fixed my computer by replacing a graphics card. They took a couple of hours to do the job.

name: Akash PK
message: Looking to upgrade the video card in your computer? While the swapping-out part is simple, the decision-making leading up to it can be involved.
